name: Cooking Pix
description:
CookingPix is an online cooking card game for 1-5 players.
You can enjoy simple yet deep strategy building and bargaining.
You can play many times in a short time, so even people who don't have time can enjoy it easily!

Simple rules and deep strategy




Mouse clicks only! Anyone can play.

The game ends when one player gets 3 cooking cards,
At that time, ""the player who collected ☆ wins""

1. Players get food cards and cooking cards in order.
2. Cooking Cards can be earned when the ingredients are met.
3. The game ends when one player gets 3 cooking cards.
4. The winner is the player with the most ☆ dishes!
4.5 If you have coins on the cooking card, you will get coins every time it is your turn.
Coins can replace ingredients!

What lies beyond victory?




If you win the game, you can get the opponent's ""Mug Cup"".
To get your favorite color, you need to think of a more reliable strategy!

Enjoy alone or with others!


You can play with NPCs even if you are alone. Great for building strategies.

Even people who do not usually play games can play immediately.
Enjoy CookingPix with your family and friends!
